commands.speaker: Honoka, Rin, Ayumu, Rina, Kanan, Dia
commands.line: Thank you, come again!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: We're performing our cooking and customer service tasks far more smoothly than before.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yeah...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Rina, what's the matter?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Oh, it's just... I found a post from a regular here on the internet. Apparently, they came by while we were working the other day.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It said that they thought the food tasted kinda different. Oh, but they said it tasted fine anyway.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: I guess the flavor really does change depending on who's making it. Maybe there are more secret ingredients, just like with Rin's ramen.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Were there any other people who thought the food was off? Oh no... What if the restaurant's reputation went down because of us?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Guys, listen up! I just got a call from the owner. He said he's feeling better, so he's gonna stop by!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Is that true? Then that solves our flavor problem. This way, we will be able to provide our customers with the taste they came for.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I'm so happy that the owner is feeling better!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: All right, let's keep at it 'til he gets here!

commands.speaker: Rin, Ayumu, Rina, Kanan, Dia
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: And we're closed! Another good day of work!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Everything was much easier once the owner came by. It was really reassuring too!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Excuse me, may we have a moment?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Hm? What's up?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Well, it's just... We'll be able to come tomorrow, but we're not sure about the days after that. We don't have a lot of leeway in our schedules, so...

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I do apologize, especially given that we were the ones who offered our assistance.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Don't feel bad! You two helped us out plenty! You guys live super far away and you still showed up today. We don't want you to push yourselves if it's too much.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: But it'll be difficult to run the restaurant if we're down two people.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I don't think we have to worry about that.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: The owner told me that the employees who had been taking time off will be coming back tomorrow, and since the owner is feeling better too, they'll be opening as usual again!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: We did it... WE DID IT!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Both the owner AND the employees are coming back! This isn't a dream, is it? The restaurant made a full recovery!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I get to come back here again! I get to eat their ramen again! We did it!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I'm so happy for you! 'Cause it looks like you made a full recovery too!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: I think we can close the book on this one then. Oh, but what about tomorrow? If we're not helping out here, we've got the whole day free.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Then why don't we all come back here and have ramen? It'll be like a great big welcome back celebration!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I like that idea. We have to celebrate Rin's recovery, too!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: It's not every day that I get to eat ramen so special. I'm looking forward to it!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Though we initially came as helpers, from here on out we will be customers. What a strange feeling.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: But I bet the food will taste even better than usual. Rina-chan Board says, "Woo-hoo!"

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Everyone, thank you so, so much! Tomorrow's ramen is going to be the best!

commands.speaker: Honoka, Ayumu, Rina, Kanan, Dia
commands.line: (Honoka, Ayumu, Rina, Kanan) Yeah! (Dia) Yes!
